remarks: The set of all continuous functions from topology ` J ` to topology ` K ` .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnfval $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) -> ( J Cn K ) = { f e. ( Y ^m X ) | A. y e. K ( `' f " y ) e. J } ) $.
